submission:
class Solution:
    def countOfPairs(self, nums: List[int]) -> int:
        MOD = 1_000_000_007
        n = len(nums)
        m = max(nums)
        arr = [1] * (nums[-1] + 1) + [0] * (m - nums[-1])
        arr = [i % MOD for i in accumulate(arr)]
        for i in reversed(range(n - 1)):
            dn = nums[i] - nums[i + 1]
            dn = dn if dn > 0 else 0
            pre = nums[i] - dn
            # print(dn)
            if pre < 0:
                return 0
            narr = [0] * dn + arr[:pre + 1] + [0] * (m - nums[i])
            arr = [i % MOD for i in accumulate(narr)]
            # print(arr)
        return arr[-1]
